name: Java Phase Test - 2
description: A quiz covering topics from your Java Phase Test - 2.

questions.text: What is the correct way to declare an array of integers named 'numbers' with a size of 5 in Java?
Which of the following String class methods can be used to compare the content of two strings?
Linear search has a time complexity of O(n).
Which of the following is NOT a primitive data type in Java?
Can a class extend multiple classes in Java?
Which keyword is used to implement inheritance in Java?
What is method overriding in Java?
options: Defining a new method with the same name but different parameters in the same class.
Defining a method in a subclass with the same name and parameters as a method in its superclass.
Defining multiple methods with the same name in the same class.
Calling a method of the superclass from the subclass.
correctAnswers: Defining a method in a subclass with the same name and parameters as a method in its superclass.

questions.text: Which of the following are unchecked exceptions in Java?
The 'finally' block in a try-catch-finally statement is always executed.
What is the time complexity of the binary search algorithm?
Which of the following statements is true about Java?
options: Java supports multiple inheritance through classes.
Java supports multiple inheritance through interfaces.
Java only supports single inheritance through interfaces.
correctAnswers: Java supports multiple inheritance through interfaces.

questions.text: What is the purpose of the 'super' keyword in Java?
options: To call a method of the superclass.
To create an instance of the superclass.
To indicate that a class is a superclass.
correctAnswers: To call a method of the superclass.

questions.text: Which sorting algorithm has an average time complexity of O(n log n)?
What will be the output of `"Hello".substring(1, 4)`?
Which of the following is a valid way to handle a potential exception in Java?
